errors.error_description: The command `pip install piccolo[postgres]` may fail in some shells (like zsh) because it lacks quotes. The shell might interpret `[postgres]` as a glob pattern instead of part of the package name.
The command `piccolo asgi new --orm piccolo` is incorrect. The `--orm` flag is not a valid parameter for this command.

The installation instructions show the `pip install` command being run before the command to activate the virtual environment. This will install the package in the global or user site-packages instead of the intended virtual environment.
correction_candidates: Move the `pip install` commands to the top, before creating the virtual environment.
Replace `source myenv/bin/activate` with `myenv/bin/pip install 'piccolo[postgres]'` and remove the separate pip install step.
Move the `source myenv/bin/activate` command to be right after `python3 -m venv myenv` and before any `pip install` commands.
Remove the virtual environment creation steps entirely.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `source myenv/bin/activate` command to be right after `python3 -m venv myenv` and before any `pip install` commands.

errors.error_description: In the ORM usage example, the line `b = Band(name='C-Sharps' popularity=100)` is missing a comma between the `name` and `popularity` arguments, which will cause a Python `SyntaxError`.
correction_candidates: Change the line to `b = Band(name='C-Sharps', popularity=100)`.
Change the line to `b = Band.create(name='C-Sharps', popularity=100)`.
Change the line to `b = Band(name='C-Sharps'; popularity=100)`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the line to `b = Band(name='C-Sharps', popularity=100)`.

errors.error_description: The command `pip install piccolo --all-extras` is not a valid pip command. The `--all-extras` flag is incorrect syntax for installing optional dependencies.
System dependencies installation step placed after pip installation instead of before
correction_candidates: Move the system dependencies installation before all pip install commands
Remove the system dependencies installation step entirely
Add the system dependencies installation after the virtual environment setup
Place the system dependencies installation at the end of the installation section
errors.golden_answer: Move the system dependencies installation before all pip install commands

errors.error_description: References a non-existent requirements.txt file for installation
correction_candidates: Remove the requirements.txt installation step entirely
errors.golden_answer: Remove the requirements.txt installation step entirely

errors.error_description: Unnecessary Django and psycopg2-binary dependencies added to PostgreSQL installation command
Incorrect command 'piccolo-admin asgi new' instead of 'piccolo asgi new'
